mapper.select: select fd.feedNo, fd.userId, fd.feedContent, fd.feedImg, fd.feedImgs, fd.feedGoodCnt, fd.feedDate, fd.feedUpdate, fd.feedLock, g.userId as isGood, q.userId as isQook from feed fd, good g, qook q where fd.feedNo = g.feedNo(+) and fd.feedNo = q.feedNo(+) and fd.userId in(select us.userId from userInfo uq, userInfo us, follow f where uq.userId = f.reqId and f.resId = us.userId and uq.userId = #{userId}) and g.userId(+) = #{userId} and q.userId(+) = #{userId} ORDER BY fd.feedDate DESC
